name: Troll Man (itch)
description:
Troll Man:Troll Face Quest is a click and point troll game full of slapstick jokes and pranks. No logic is required to solve the wackiest and maddest complex puzzles. And You should not treat them too seriously. open you mind and keep a creatively brain, The quirky and quick brain teasers and hilarious pranks will make you laugh twist. 

Fans of free escape and find hidden object games will love this trollface game. It's full of funny and twisted puzzles. No need to worry about the brained puzzles are too complex. when you got stuck( you are trolled), the auto hint will help you.No, this is no a stupid design nor a silly game.You are not the one to be trolled. but the troller, and this is not a logic game, but a tricky troll face quest game. Hope the funny meme keeps you laughing.

Be a man and do the right thing is not always a easy thing, The main character of Troll Man:Trollface Quest, he is a forever alone guy with a forever alone face. But he want to be a hero, He will meet many Awkward and hilarious situations. what would you do if you were him. be a man or be a troller?

-Over 20 funny and crazy levels
-Casual Scenario-Based Puzzle Game
-A troll face crazy game
-Well-designed pranks full of black humors

-Funny, tricky and hilarious gameplay.

-To Troll Or Be Trolled, Be a Hero or Be a troller, Up To You
